entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Saskatoon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saskatoon Diefenbaker Int'l Airport 08:51 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: W 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Fog dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
